# Approved Specifications

This directory contains approved feature specifications that guide AI agent development.

## Structure
- Each spec: `FEATURE_NAME.md`
- Status in frontmatter: Draft / Under Review / Approved / Changes Requested
- All specs use `../SPEC_TEMPLATE.md` format

## Workflow
1. Agent creates spec using template
2. Submit for review to @shelbeely
3. Iterate on feedback
4. Get approval
5. Implement exactly as specified
